g.text: App Metadata Streaming Feature App in C codespace
1. Identify GPIO monitoring PIN for connected GARD.
2. Acquire the GPIO line for the chosen pin.
3. Set up all the variables of the current GPIO event ctx.
5. Add GPIO line to monitoring bulk.
6. Launch worker thread for GPIO pin and
Wait for event_cond_var for event to occur in
1. Request GPIO events on both edges for mon_bulk.
2. Wait for event to occur on mon_bulk.
Wait for event to occur. GARD will interrupt on set GPIO line.
event_bulk is populated with lines on which event has occured.
Fetch data from GARD and fills in buffer of given size.
Call user provided callback function - appdata_user_cb(context, buffer, size)
2. Stop and Join GPIO event threads.
